description:
Learn the reality of professional trading: Focus on income trading as compare to PIPS per trade.

Trade with confidence and certainty. Get all the tools you need to succeed as a trader. Get personalized support to keep you on track and reach your goal.

Give students all the tools to become either a professional trader or a savvy informed investor. The goal is to reach confidence and certainty in trading not only FOREX but any other financial instrument.

At the completion of the course the students will have a deep understanding of the tradings fundamentals as well as a clear path to success. The goal is to create highly skills traders who can either trade for themselves or trade professionally.

Whether the students is interested to become a professional trader or just want to manage his or her portfolio more effectively this course will give them the tools necessary to be successful as a trader or investor.

At the end of the course the students will be able to make intelligent trading decision based on market dynamics and market knowledge. This is a comprehensive course which will include real life examples.

Additionally, after completion, students will have FREE access to our proprietary trading software : Trendragon. Trendragon is a foundation trading software which effectively help the traders with entries, profit taking as well position management.

This course is specifically designed for :

* The novice trader who wants to learn about trading

* Help the professional/Experience trader trades with more confidence and certainty

* The investor who wants easy to understand tools to make informed investment decision

* Individual interested in trading within a group of traders with individual mentor-ship coaching
title: WE WILL PAY YOU TO TRADE WITH US
